attributes.action: Recognise the talents of Australian exports "The Wiggles"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know of no other group of childrens entertainers who are both eduacational and fun to watch. They also tour the whole world from USA to Japan. They have already been identified as Australias best export! My 4 year old daughter is hooked on them and learns from watching. This country should recognise them in the form of an OBE for each member.
